column4: anyone know of backup software that will only copy what has changed? Because I really don't want to have to copy over 30GB of files every time I backup my home dir.
rsnapshot (it's based on rsync and gives you nice time-series backups using hard-links)
will rsnapshot work properly with the NFTS support thing that comes with ubuntu? or will I have to reformat my drive?
pretty sure that shouldn't matter, but depends on how rsync figures out file deltas
